channel.title: Home on Scratch Addons
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Scratch Addons

item.title: Chrome Web Store Privacy Information
item.description: Single purpose Allows users to customize their experience on the Scratch website (scratch.mit.edu) by providing previously unavailable features - including many related to reading and replying of Scratch messages/notifications. This extension makes use of the “Scratch API” (api.scratch.mit.edu). Permission justification Permission Justification Host permission Used to access information from, and run content scripts on the Scratch website. cookies Used to access the scratchcsrftoken cookie, which needs to be included as an X-CsrfToken header for Scratch API calls.
